question_content.description:
### Problem13

Suppose that both a and b are boolean variables.

```java
boolean x = !(( !a && b ) || ( b || !a ));
```

If both a and b are false, the value of x is _____(0)\___ (true/false).

If a is true and b is false, the value of x is _____(1)\___ (true/false).

If a is false and b is true, the value of x is _____(2)\___ (true/false).
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
